wikipedia_page.main: Charles Edward Wilson (2 June 1871 – 17 September 1914) was an England rugby international and British Army officer who was killed during the First World War.

response: * Charles Edward Wilson (businessman) (1886–1972), CEO of GE and member of the Truman Administration
* Charles Edward Wilson (rugby union) (1871–1914), British military officer and rugby union player
* Charles Edward Wilson (educationalist) FRSE (1815–1888) first Chief Inspector of Schools in Scotland
